ing: 2 chunks fresh watermelon, seeds removed, or more to taste
2 fresh strawberries, hulled, or more to taste
2 packets Wholesome Organic Stevia, or more to taste
des: "This refreshing blend of strawberries and watermelon is sweetened with organic stevia and finished with sparkling water and ice. A perfect drink for a hot summer day."
ins:
Muddle fresh fruit, Wholesome Organic Stevia and basil.
Top with ice and sparkling water.
